talk.author: did:plc:np6i4w2m3vyq6r4zc664e4t2
talk.utter: Except, of course, Honolulu in 1961 was as much the US as Washington, DC. The Panama Canal Zone, by contrast, was not.

talk.author: did:plc:mivey63nzylfflvmmjoqcf6u
